title: [PS3] LEGO Indiana Jones 2: The Adventure Continues
description:
<a href="http://www.lucasarts.com/games/legoindianajones2/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.lucasarts.com/games/legoindianajones2/</a>


Indy returns with brand new LEGO-based levels from The Original Adventures and The Kingdom of the Crystal Skull.

* Build your own LEGO Indy adventures and play by your own rules
* Take advantage of new character and vehicle abilities
* Challenge a friend to all-new multiplayer modes such as two player split screen
